languages.text: "Флот Осознание прославляет завершение схизмы. Ересь избыта, чистота Ритуала восстановлена. Омниссия знает все, постигает все".
"The Cognisance Fleet praises the end of the schism. The heresy is purged, the purity of the Ritual is restored. The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."
languages.original_text: "Флот Осознание прославляет завершение схизмы. Ересь избыта, чистота Ритуала восстановлена. Омниссия знает все, постигает все".

traits.locale_text: "The Cognisance Fleet praises the end of the schism. The heresy is purged. The purity of the Ritual is restored. Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."
"The Cognisance Fleet praises the end of the schism. The heresy is purged. The purity of the Ritual is restored. Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."
"The Cognisance Fleet praises the end of the schism. The heresy is purged, the purity of the Ritual is restored. The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."
"The Cognisance Fleet praises the end of the schism. The heresy is purged, the purity of the Ritual is restored. The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."
"The Cognisance Fleet praises the end of the schism. The heresy is purged, the purity of the Ritual is restored. The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."

languages.text: “赞美欧姆尼塞亚，分裂终于结束了。异端分子得到了清除，仪式的纯洁性得到了恢复。欧姆尼塞亚无所不知，无所不晓。”
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet praises the end of the schism. The heresy is purged, the purity of the Ritual is restored. The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."

traits.locale_text: “赞美欧姆尼塞亚，分裂终于结束了。异端分子得到了清除，仪式的纯洁性得到了恢复。欧姆尼塞亚无所不知，无所不晓。”

languages.text: « La Flotte de la Connaissance loue la fin du schisme. L'hérésie a été purgée, la pureté du rituel est restaurée. L'Omnimessie sait tout et comprend tout. »
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet praises the end of the schism. The heresy is purged, the purity of the Ritual is restored. The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."

traits.locale_text: « La Flotte de la Connaissance loue la fin du schisme. L'hérésie a été purgée, la pureté du rituel est restaurée. L'Omnimessie sait tout et comprend tout. »

languages.text: «La Flota Conciencia celebra el fin del cisma. Purgaremos la herejía y el Ritual volverá a ser puro de nuevo. El Omnissiah lo sabe todo y lo comprende todo».
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet praises the end of the schism. The heresy is purged, the purity of the Ritual is restored. The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."

traits.locale_text: «La Flota Conciencia celebra el fin del cisma. Purgaremos la herejía y el Ritual volverá a ser puro de nuevo. El Omnissiah lo sabe todo y lo comprende todo».

languages.text: 「コグニサンス艦隊は分裂の終結を称賛する。異端は浄化され、穢れなき儀式が回復した。万機神はすべてを知り、すべてを包む」
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet praises the end of the schism. The heresy is purged, the purity of the Ritual is restored. The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."

traits.locale_text: 「コグニサンス艦隊は分裂の終結を称賛する。異端は浄化され、穢れなき儀式が回復した。万機神はすべてを知り、すべてを包む」

languages.text: "Die Erkenntnisflotte singt ein Loblied auf das Ende der Spaltung. Die Ketzerei ist gereinigt, die Reinheit des Rituals ist wiederhergestellt. Der Omnissiah weiß alles, versteht alles."
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet praises the end of the schism. The heresy is purged, the purity of the Ritual is restored. The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."

traits.locale_text: "Die Erkenntnisflotte singt ein Loblied auf das Ende der Spaltung." Die Ketzerei ist gereinigt, die Reinheit des Rituals ist wiederhergestellt. Der Omnissiah weiß alles, versteht alles."

languages.text: "Malumat Filosu, bölünmenin sonunu kutluyor. Kâfirliğin kökü kurutuldu, Ayin'in halisliği onarıldı. Hermesih her şeyi bilir, her şeyin farkındadır."
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet praises the end of the schism. The heresy is purged, the purity of the Ritual is restored. The Omnissiah knows all, comprehends all."
